pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Microsemi Adaptec RAID Controller Command Line Utility allows you to: Create and delete logical drives. Display and modify configuration settings. Copy configurations from one computer to another. Recover from a failed physical device and rebuild an affected logical drive. Flash new firmware and BIOS onto the controller. Enable the controller to check the removal and connection of any disk drives. Provides access to the status and event logs of a controller. Isolate problems and determine their causes.
